mapper.select: SELECT departure_date AS departureDate, flight_name AS flightName, boarding_class_cd AS boardingClassCd, fare_type_cd AS fareTypeCd, vacant_num AS vacantNum FROM flight WHERE departure_date < #{date} ORDER BY departure_date, flight_name, boarding_class_cd, fare_type_cd

SELECT reserve_flight_no AS reserveFlightNo, reserve_no AS reserveNo, departure_date AS departureDate, flight_name AS flightName, boarding_class_cd AS boardingClassCd, fare_type_cd AS fareTypeCd FROM reserve_flight WHERE departure_date < #{date} ORDER BY departure_date, reserve_flight_no

SELECT passenger_no AS passengerNo, passenger.reserve_flight_no AS reserveFlightNo, family_name AS familyName, given_name AS givenName, age AS age, gender AS gender, customer_no AS customerNo FROM passenger JOIN reserve_flight ON reserve_flight.reserve_flight_no = passenger.reserve_flight_no WHERE reserve_flight.departure_date < #{date} ORDER BY reserve_flight.departure_date, passenger_no
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM passenger USING reserve_flight WHERE reserve_flight.departure_date < #{date} AND reserve_flight.reserve_flight_no = passenger.reserve_flight_no
